result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. David A. Stone III

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Transcript from Hearing on September 13, 2016

Defendant David A. Stone in court with attorney S. Joseph Randtke.  Kelly J Mcknight appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Cases 15CF18,155,249,15CM272,16CF155. DA agreement reached, Def plea to Cts 3 and4 in 15CF155, Ct 1 15CF249, state would move to dismiss other counts against him. Outstanding felon in possession of ammunition will not be referred to the US Attorney's Office for pros. Recommends sentencing date after defendants revocation on other case(s) 2yrs in 2yrs ES consec to any other sent, UA, $10 fine costs, DNA, AODA, no MAS-not present, cogn, couns, no dangerous weapons. Def/Atty Randtke advise this is the agreement.
Def pleads NC to 3 counts. Admits repeater. 15CF18, 15CF155 cts 2 and 5, 15CM272, 16CF155 DRI. Ct, notes no further referral to the US Attorney's office
Ct accepts pleas and finds def Guilty. 
Sentencing Hearing 11/9 11:30am

Attorney S. Joseph Randtke in court for Defendant David A. Stone. Prosecuting Atty Ruth Diane Kressel appeared for State of Wisconsin. Defendant David A. Stone appeared by video means from ACJ. Cases 16CF155, 15CM272, 15CM249,155,18. ADA proposal just tendered asks for adjourned hearing. Atty may appr by phone if no agreement.  Status conference scheduled for September 7, 2016 at 04:00 pm.

Attorney S. Joseph Randtke appeared by phone means for Defendant David A. Stone. Prosecuting Atty Kelly J Mcknight appeared for State of Wisconsin. (5 cases) Def in custody Atty Randtke request to reschedule. Ct finds good cause to move date.STC all cases8/30 10:30am  Status conference scheduled for August 30, 2016 at 10:30 am.
Discovery Demand - State
Def

Defendant David A. Stone in court via v/con    Ruth Diane Kressel appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Mark Perrine talks..talking with atty's to find an atty for def, but unable to so far. cancel warrant in 16CF155. living with grandfather in Ashland. Def saying he posted orig bail  got out got rearrested needs a new bond for new case. Cant come up with money. on a PO hold. cancel warrant . Report to jail 9 - 10 am each day and follow conditions of extended supervision. $5000 sign bond  Status conference scheduled for August 15, 2016 at 10:30 am.

Defendant David A. Stone appeared by video means. Prosecuting Atty Ruth Diane Kressel appeared for State of Wisconsin. Def still awaiting council.  Status conference scheduled for July 21, 2016 at 10:45 am.

Defendant David A. Stone in court by video with attorney Kenneth Kratz appr by phone.  Ruth Diane Kressel appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Atty Kratz represented def on 3 cases, asks to be removed as atty. Def does not object to withdrawl. Ct grants motion to withdraw
Order to withdraw as counsel - Ken Kratz
Minutes Scanned!

Defendant David A. Stone in court.  Ruth Diane Kressel appeared for the State of Wisconsin. 15CF155,15CF249,15CM272. Warrants are now cancelled, 64155 Old Air Port Rd, lives with Grandfather. Looking work, tribal member, not part of the armed forces, has AODA. On probation on a hold. DA asking for a cash bail with conditions. Can not get ahold of attorney.  Court orders Cash bail $500. no contact with Katleen Smart or Dan Anderson or resd. absol, no drug para, no meth users or traffickers unless with counseling  Status conference scheduled for June 27, 2016 at 01:15 pm.
Attorney Kenneth Kratz in court.  Ruth Diane Kressel appeared for the State of Wisconsin. BOW issued in all cases failure to appr 5/20/16, set for review 6/27 (move all cases to this date)
Defendant's Motion to Amend Bond

Attorney Kenneth Kratz in court via phone.  Kelly J Mcknight appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  bond also covers 15CF272. 15Cf155 def has a $2000 cash bail. Def does not appear. Not in Jail. Atty does not know where the client is. Todays hearing was to lower the bail. Motion to modify bail is denied. BOW on ALL cases and Bond FF.

Defendant David A. Stone in court with attorney Kenneth Kratz.  Kelly J Mcknight appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Prelim in 15CF249, STC in others.  State calls Allen Lindquist, exam, cross. Ct finds prob cause, case bound over. Information filed, waives reading plea NG.  Status conference scheduled for June 6, 2016 at 01:00 pm.
